faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Your questions and concerns, answered here.

faqs.q: Are there really no extra charges?
faqs.a: No fees other than the estimate at contract time. However, if you wish to add features later, a separate estimate will be provided.
Standard plan typically takes about 1 to 1.5 months.

faqs.q: Can I update it even if I'm not good with computers?
faqs.a: Yes. For areas you'll update, we implement a system as easy to use as a smartphone app.

faqs.q: Is there support after the site launch?
faqs.a: Yes, all plans come with one month of free support after launch. Covers questions about operation and minor corrections.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.description: Omiseweb is dedicated to fully supporting foreign owners who are challenging the business world in Japan, overcoming the walls of language, culture, and digital.

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.content: Lead businesses of foreign owners to success with the power of digital, especially those with wonderful services or products but facing online communication challenges. Through soulful, original websites—not templates—we deliver the true value of your shop to fans in Japan.

sections.title: Why Choose Us?
sections.content: Our founder has personal experience in international business and deeply understands the importance and difficulties of cross-cultural communication. We prioritize careful consultation in your native language, not just technical support. We understand your passion for business, its cultural context, and express it optimized for the Japanese market.

worksPage.title: Our Works
worksPage.description: Here are some success stories we created for our clients' businesses. See the quality of our design and the results it produced.

cases.name: Chinese Restaurant 'Ryuteki Kitchen'
cases.description: To convey the charm of a restaurant fusing traditional taste with modern space, we focused on luxurious design and appetizing photos. An online reservation system was also introduced.
cases.before: Old site didn't convey charm, phone reservations only
cases.after: With design refresh and web reservations, new customers in their 20s-30s and bookings increased 1.5x!

cases.name: Thai Massage 'Siam Healing'
cases.description: To convey healing space and authentic treatments, we used calm colors and relaxing images. Treatment menu is presented clearly to smoothly guide users to web reservations.
cases.before: Information outdated, hard to see on smartphones
cases.after: Achieved 200% month-over-month increase in new web bookings with mobile optimization!

cases.name: Korean Style Cafe 'Seoul Cafe'
cases.description: Expressed the cuteness of Instagrammable menu and space. To appeal to young female target, we incorporated pop design and video content to establish brand image.
cases.before: Only had Instagram, lacking credibility without official website
cases.after: Strengthened branding by launching official site, leading to more media inquiries!

cases.name: International School
cases.description: We focused on clearly communicating educational philosophy and curriculum features to parents. In addition to multilingual support, we built a system for frequent updates of student testimonials and event information.
cases.before: Information scattered, making it difficult to find what was needed
cases.after: By reorganizing the site structure and improving the inquiry form, applications for information sessions doubled.
